S0142: 你真好，我很感激你帮助我。
That's very kind of you and I'm grateful to you for helping.
S0143: 这和我们之前谈论的是同一件事。
It's the same thing as we were talking about earlier.
S0144: 我今天早上醒得比我想要的早。
I woke earlier than I wanted to this morning.
S0145: Why are you not happy any more?
S0146: 自从我们试图修理它以来，似乎什么都不工作了。
Nothing seems to be working since we tried to fix it.
S0147: 当她看到我感到紧张时，她非常友好。
She was very kind when she saw me feeling nervous.
S0148: 当我不能回答时，他不是很耐心。
He wasn't very patient when I couldn't answer.
S0149: 这不是很难，所以我希望你很快完成。
This isn't very difficult, so I hope you'll finish soon.
S0150: 你能告诉我你的名字是什么吗？
Can you tell me what your name is?
S0151: 那不是我希望会发生的事。
That wasn't what I was hoping would happen.
S0152: 如果我知道你想要什么，我会做得不同。
I would have done it differently if I had known what you wanted.
S0153: 我不会用完全相同的方式说它。
I wouldn't have said it in exactly the same way.
S0154: 你想在星期六晚上在哪里见面？
Where do you want to meet on Saturday night?
S0155: 我不介意明天早上等几分钟。
I don't mind waiting for a few minutes tomorrow morning.
S0156: Do you want to go to a restaurant tonight?
S0157: I won't be able to be there next month.
S0159: That isn't what I'm trying to say.
S0160: 你怎么用中文说这个词？
How do you say this word in Mandarin Chinese?
S0161: 你能在星期天早上给我那本书吗？
Can you give me that book on Sunday morning?
S0162: What do you think about that?
S0165: 但是我不确定它是不是真的。
But I'm not sure if it's true.
S0166: 我的名字不是很不寻常。
My name is not very unusual.
S0167: 你明天下午需要做什么？
What do you need to do tomorrow afternoon?
S0168: And then I'll be able to come and help later on.
S0169: What do you want me to do?
S0170: 我想让你告诉我你需要什么。
I'd like you to tell me what you need.
S0171: Do you want me to help you look for it?
S0172: Yes that would be very helpful.
S0173: 不用了，谢谢，我可以自己应付。
No thank you I can manage on my own.
S0174: 你能理解我在说什么吗？
Can you understand what I'm saying?
S0175: 你想在星期天早上做什么？
What do you want to do on Sunday morning?
S0176: 我会问他明年他能不能帮忙。
I'll ask him if he'll be able to help next year.
S0177: I'll ask her where she wants to go.
S0178: 我没有时间，虽然我想见你。
I didn't have time, although I wanted to see you.
S0179: 你星期天下午打算做什么？
What are you going to do on Sunday afternoon?
S0180: I'd like to read my book for a while.
S0181: 但是我必须带我妈妈去看医生。
But I have to take my mother to the doctor.
S0182: 你在哪里看到过我的钥匙吗？
Have you seen my keys anywhere?
S0183: 不，恐怕我没有看到它们。
No I'm afraid I haven't seen them.
S0184: 是的，我刚才在办公室看到它们了。
Yes I saw them in the office a while ago.
S0185: 我想你把它们落在工作的地方了。
I think you left them at work.
S0186: 你想下周谈点不同的事情吗？
Do you want to talk about something different next week?
S0188: So I don't need to change.
S0190: 你介意我问你一些问题吗？
Do you mind if I ask you some questions?
S0191: No I don't mind at all.
S0193: 对不起，但是我今天太忙了。
I'm sorry but I'm too busy today.
S0195: 我在试图找我留在桌子上的钱。
I'm trying to find the money I left on the table.
S0196: 你听说过最新的想法吗？
Have you heard the latest idea?
S0197: My son works as a teacher.
S0198: 我的女儿为市政府工作。
My daughter works for the council.
S0199: 我的朋友过去在办公室工作。
My friend used to work in an office.
S0200: 他们说他们想确保我们及时完成所有事情。
They say they want to make sure that we finish everything in time.
S0201: 我们想知道会发生什么。
We wanted to know what was going to happen.
S0202: 没有人确定如何回答这个问题。
Nobody was sure how to answer the question.
S0203: 如果我要求你帮助我，你会做什么？
What would you do if I asked you to help me?
S0204: 我想让她帮你处理安排。
I wanted her to help you to deal with the arrangements.
S0205: 我忘记了我试图说的词。
I've forgotten the word I was trying to say.
S0206: 我喜欢有机会和你练习说话。
I enjoy the chance to practise speaking with you.
S0207: 你已经做了你需要做的事。
You've done what you needed to do.
S0208: I didn't want to ask you how to say it.
S0209: 他们想花更多的时间作为一个小组聚会。
They want to spend more time meeting as a group.
S0210: 他们认为我们需要讨论这个问题。
They think that we need to discuss the problem.
